attributes.additional_details: This partition is to ask the government to change the law so that PLEV's (Electronic/Electric Scooters) can be ridden in public areas. Currently they are banned from both Pavements and Roads. PLEVs are a cost effective environmentally friendly emission free way of getting around a town or city.
attributes.background:
The use of PLEVs will be of great benefit to people with reduced mobility who are require some assistance but are not at a point where a full  mobility scooter is required.
They will also reduce the number of local commutes with motor vehicles thereby reducing pollution.
